sentences.sentence: The company also runs trips to coincide with the spring transhumance, which takes place in the first week of June.
sentences.translation: 这家公司也有春季的“牧场搬家”旅游项目，时间是六月的第一个星期。

sentences.sentence: The charm of the region no doubt lies in this adherence to traditional ways of life, and the transhumance is a vital - and ever more central - part of this.
sentences.translation: 无疑，这里的魅力正是在于保留了传统的生活方式，而“牧场搬家”是其中最有活力的部分，甚至是核心部分。
